notes: PAP frozen 2025-11-04T10:06Z; confirmatory HC3 OLS executed 2025-11-04T10:17Z with seed 20251016. FDR adjustment archived to tables/fdr_adjustment_confirmatory.csv. Next: finalize robustness automation per PAP and document outputs.
